messages.message: Invalid dfdByteLength. If there is Key/Value Data the dfdByteLength/dfdTotalSize must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset.
messages.details: dfdByteLength is 92 but it must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset which is 94.
kvdByteOffset is 198 but the Key/Value Data must immediately follow (with 4 byte alignment) the Data Format Descriptor so it must be 196.
